item.title: My Music Production Hardware & Software
item.description: My Music Production Hardware Current Audio Interfaces Native Instruments Audio 6 MK1 Controller Keyboards Native Instruments Komplete Kontrol M32 Novation LaunchKey 61 DJ Controllers Native Instruments Traktor Kontrol S3 Drum Machines & Grooveboxes Native Instruments Maschine MK3 Portable Keyboards Yamaha EZ-300 Synthesizers Yamaha Motif ES8 Past Drum Machines KORG ElecTribe R (ER-1) Roland R-8 Human Rhythm Composer Keyboards Casio PT-50 JVC KB-700 Sound Modules Roland Edirol SD90 Synthesizers Casio CZ-101 Yamaha SY85 My Music Production Software Ableton Ableton AG is a German music software company that produces and distributes the production and performance program Ableton Live and a collection of related instruments and sample libraries, as well as their own hardware controller Ableton Push
item.content:encoded:
My Music Production Hardware

Current

  • Audio Interfaces
    • Native Instruments Audio 6 MK1
  • Controller Keyboards
    • Native Instruments Komplete Kontrol M32
    • Novation LaunchKey 61
  • DJ Controllers
    • Native Instruments Traktor Kontrol S3
  • Drum Machines & Grooveboxes
    • Native Instruments Maschine MK3
  • Portable Keyboards
    • Yamaha EZ-300
  • Synthesizers
    • Yamaha Motif ES8

Past

  • Drum Machines
    • KORG ElecTribe R (ER-1)
    • Roland R-8 Human Rhythm Composer
  • Keyboards
    • Casio PT-50
    • JVC KB-700
  • Sound Modules
    • Roland Edirol SD90
  • Synthesizers
    • Casio CZ-101
    • Yamaha SY85

My Music Production Software

Ableton

Ableton AG is a German music software company that produces and distributes the production and performance program Ableton Live and a collection of related instruments and sample libraries, as well as their own hardware controller Ableton Push

  • Ableton Live

AIR Music Technology

AIR provides legendary virtual instruments, effects, expansions, sound packs and software subscriptions that bring music production to the next level

  • AIR Essential Synths Pack
    • LOOM II
    • The Riser
    • Vacuum Pro
  • AIR Power Pack
    • Hybrid 3
      • Hybrid 3 Expansion: E-lec-tro Waves
      • Hybrid 3 Expansion: Fresh Energy
    • Mini Grand
    • Velvet 2

Apple

Apple Inc. is an American computer and consumer electronics company famous for creating the iPhone, iPad and Macintosh computers

  • Logic Pro

Arturia

Arturia is a French electronics company who design and manufacture audio interfaces and electronic musical instruments, including software synthesizers, drum machines, analog synthesizers, digital synthesizers, MIDI controllers, sequencers, and mobile apps

  • Efx MOTIONS
  • FX Collection
  • V Collection
    • V Collection X now includes 39 instruments & 10,000 high-quality presets
      • 2 new instruments: CP-70 & Augmented Woodwinds
      • 2 added instruments: Mini Freak V & Acid V
      • 2 additional augmented series: Augmented Grand Piano & Augmented Brass
    • Instrument List
      • ARP 2600 V
      • Acid V
      • Analog Lab Pro
      • Augmented BRASS
      • Augmented GRAND PIANO
      • Augmented STRINGS
      • Augmented VOICES
      • Augmented WOODWINDS
      • B-3 V
      • Buchla Easel V
      • CMI V
      • CP-70 V
      • CS-80 V
      • CZ V
      • Clavinet V
      • DX7 V
      • Emulator II V
      • Farfisa V
      • Hyper Rave
      • Inner City Soul
      • Inward Universe
      • Jun-6 V
      • Jup-8 V
      • KORG MS-20 V
      • Matrix-12 V
      • Mellotron V
      • Mini V
      • Mini V 4
      • MiniFreak V
      • Modular V
      • OP-Xa V
      • Piano V
      • Pigments
      • Prophet-5 V
      • Prophet-VS V
      • SEM V
      • SQ80 V
      • Solina V
      • Stage-73 V
      • Synclavier V
      • Synthi V
      • VOX Continental V
      • Vocoder V
      • Wurli V
      • Wurli V 3
    • Expansion Packs
      • Inward Universe
      • Inner City Soul
      • Hyper Rave
  • Wavelengths Bundle

Cherry Audio

Cherry Audio was formed by a small group of industry veterans from the likes of Sonic Foundry, Cakewalk, Bias, Acoustica, and Keyboard Magazine

  • Synthesizer Expander Module Synthesizer
  • Voltage Modular

Eventide

Eventide Inc. is an American pro audio, broadcast and communications company whose audio division manufactures digital effects processors, digital signal processor (DSP) software, and guitar effects pedals.

  • Blackhole

Heavyocity

Heavyocity is a collective of pro composers and sound designers with a mission to create world class virtual instruments for today’s modern composer and sound designer

  • PUNISH Lite

Image-Line

Image-Line Software is a Belgian software company best known for its digital audio workstation program FL Studio and related audio plugins such as Sytrus and Harmor

  • FL Studio (Fruity Edition)

iOS

  • AudioKit Pro
    • Jam with Jordan
    • King of Digital | Hybrid Synth
    • King of FM: DX Synth/E Piano
    • SAGA Synth | 16-Bit Super Fun!

iZotope

iZotope Inc. is an audio technology company based in the United States who develop professional audio software for audio recording, mixing, broadcast, sound design, and mastering which can be used in wide range of digital audio workstation programs

  • Audiolens
  • Insight 2
  • Neutron 4 Elements
  • Ozone 10 Elements
  • Stutter Edit 2

KORG

KORG Inc. is a Japanese multinational corporation that manufactures electronic musical instruments, audio processors and guitar pedals, recording equipment, and electronic tuners

  • KORG Collection 4
    • microKORG
    • KAOSS PAD
    • ELECTRIBE-R
    • TRITON
    • M1
    • WAVESTATION
    • ARP ODYSSEY
    • Prophecy
    • miniKORG 700S
    • Mono/Poly
    • Polysix
    • MS-20
    • MDE-X

LennarDigital

LennarDigital is company based in the Netherlands who develop high quality digital audio software

  • Sylenth1

Modartt

All instruments are physically modelled and simulate the playability and complex behaviour of real acoustic instruments

  • Pianoteq 8 Stage
    • Instrument Packs
      • Steinway Model D
      • Petrof AP275 + P284

Native Instruments

Native Instruments is a German company that develops, manufactures, and supplies music software and hardware for music production, sound design, performance, and DJing

  • Native Instruments Komplete 14 Ultimate
    • Orchestral & Cinematic Instruments
      • Action Strikes
      • Action Strings 2
      • Ashlight
      • Emotive Strings
      • Kinetic Metal
      • Kinetic Toys
      • Mallet Flux
      • Mysteria
      • Piano Colors
      • Pharlight
      • Rise & Hit
      • Stradivari Violin
      • Straylight
      • Symphony Essentials

        • String Ensemble

      • The Giant
      • Thrill

      • SESSION HORNS PRO

      • The MAVERICK

      • SCARBEE A-200
      • Una Corda
      • VINTAGE ORGANS
      • SCARBEE MARK I

      • Middle East
      • SCARBEE
        • PRE-BASS
        • PRE-BASS AMPED
        • CLAVINET/PIANET
        • MM-BASS
        • MM-BASS AMPED
        • JAY-BASS
      • IGNITION KEYS
      • Glaze
      • DEFT LINES
      • CLOUD SUPPLY
      • LO-FI GLOW
      • MODULAR ICONS
      • ETHEREAL EARTH
      • MELTED VIBES

    • DRUMS AND PERCUSSION INSTRUMENTS
      • BATTERY 4
      • 40’S VERY OWN DRUMS
      • POLYPLEX
      • EMPIRE BREAKS
      • DRUMLAB
      • BUTCH VIG DRUMS
      • DAMAGE
      • STUDIO DRUMMER
      • WEST AFRICA
      • ABBEY ROAD
        • VINTAGE DRUMMER
        • 50S DRUMMER
        • 60S DRUMMER
        • 70S DRUMMER
        • 80S DRUMMER
        • MODERN DRUMMER
    • EFFECTS
      • OZONE 10 STANDARD
      • BX_CONSOLE N
      • BX_LIMITER TRUE PEAK
      • BX_CRISPYTUNER
      • REPLIKA XT
      • LO-FI-AF
      • MOLEKULAR
      • SUPERCHARGER GT
      • RAUM
      • The MOUTH
      • The Finger
      • RC 24
      • RC 48
      • TRANSIENT MASTER
      • ENHANCED EQ
      • VARI COMP

      • SOLID BUS COMP
      • SOLID DYNAMICS

      • VC 2A

      • CRUSH PACK
        • BITE

        • FREAK
      • MOD PACK
        • CHORAL
        • FLAIR
        • PHASIS
      • DRIVER
    • EXPANSIONS
      • FREE FORM
      • LIQUID ENERGY
      • RHYTHM SOURCE
      • SOUL MAGIC
      • BODY MECHANIK
      • BUMPIN FLAVA
      • BACKYARD JAMS
      • MOTHER BOARD
      • NEO BOOGIE

      • AQUARIUS EARTH

      • INFINITE ESCAPE
      • PURE DRIP
      • DROP SQUAD
      • FADED REELS
      • PRISMATIC BLISS
      • MOLTEN VEIL

      • MARBLE RIMS
      • CARIBBEAN CURRENT

      • Quest

      • Rush
      • Pulse
      • Scene
      • Moebius

      • Our House

PluginGuru

Founded by veteran synth programmer and sound designer John Lehmkuhl, PlugInGuru provides inspiring synth patches for all of the most popular synth plug-ins

  • Unify
    • Modern Cinema - Ambient Dreams

ProjectSAM

ProjectSAM creates award-winning cinematic sample libraries which are used in numerous film, game and series-scores all over the world

  • The Free Orchestra

Spitfire Audio

Spitfire Audio is an English technology company based in London that creates virtual instrument sample libraries used for music production

  • BBC Symphony Orchestra Discover

Steinberg

Steinberg Media Technologies GmbH is a German musical software and hardware company based in Hamburg who develop music writing, recording, arranging, and editing software, most notably Cubase, Nuendo, and Dorico

  • Cubase Artist 13
  • Taped Vibes3

u-he

Berlin-based audio software company u-he was founded in 2001 by Urs Heckmann

  • Diva

UVI

UVI is a developer of software instruments, effects and soundware, leveraging leading-edge research and design to create unique, expressive tools for musicians and audio professionals

  • 8-Bit Synth
  • Augmented Orchestra
  • Austrian Grand
  • BeatBox Anthology 2
  • Drum Designer
  • Dual Delay X
  • Emulation II+
  • Falcon 3
    • Analog Motion
    • Digital Motion
    • Organic Arps
    • Organic Keys
    • Organic Pads
    • Spectre

  • Key Suite Electric

  • Percussion Factory

Music Theory Tools

  • EVAbeat
    • Melody Sauce 2
  • Plugin Boutique
    • Scaler 2
  • WA Production

    • InstaScale
    • Chords Pro + Notes = InstaChord 2

item.title: News: Native Instruments Sale (50% off)
item.description: Native Instruments’ amazing Summer of Sound is back. Get 50% off all KOMPLETE 14 upgrades, step up to the latest instruments and effects, or save on a range of expansions 50% off Komplete 14 upgrades 50% off Traktor Pro 3 updates 50% off Instrument & effect upgrades 50% off iZotope All offers end on 6th July 2023 See the full details here; https://www.native-instruments.com/en/catalog/summer-of-sound-2023/komplete-bundles/ Summer of Sound Sale (2023)
item.content:encoded:
Native Instruments’ amazing Summer of Sound is back.

Get 50% off all KOMPLETE 14 upgrades, step up to the latest instruments and effects, or save on a range of expansions

  • 50% off Komplete 14 upgrades
  • 50% off Traktor Pro 3 updates
  • 50% off Instrument & effect upgrades
  • 50% off iZotope

All offers end on 6th July 2023

See the full details here;

  • https://www.native-instruments.com/en/catalog/summer-of-sound-2023/komplete-bundles/
